At the end of the movie, several people are seen off and their thoughts are developed enough to board a boat heading to another city. Leah Lewis, an actor who plays Ember in Elemental, is not an immigrant actor, but she was adopted from Shanghai, China, and raised in the United States, where she can play Asian characters in American society well. Like Ember in the beginning, there's another character who shows his antipathy to other elements and the city: Bernie Lumen, Ember's father. Bernie Lumen, as a first-generation immigrant, lived in Element City and was very discriminated against and hated mixing with other elements. So he's also a character who played a big role in opening Fireplace, a general store, and creating Fire Town, a village where many fire elements live in Element City The signature menu of Bernie Lumen is LAVA JAVA, This drink is a parody of a coffee brand called JAVALAVA. Ember's mother, Cinder Lumen, was pregnant when she moved to Element City and gave birth to Ember Inside Bernie's store, Fire Place, he runs a kind of fortune-telling that looks at the couple's compatibility with smells, showing Korean elements The fact that she tells her daughter, Ember, that dating and marriage are only the same elements is similar to Peter Sohn's grandmother's story, and she appears as a character with various settings As you can see from the
